#T_SP=custom.Span|label
#Text=Senior Software Engineer\r
#Text=Welcome to the future of property maintenance.
#Text=Property Meld�s vision is to radically improve how the property management industry handles property maintenance.
#Text=If you�ve ever had a maintenance issue at your housing rental, you know how much of a pain it can be to get it fixed quickly and reliably.
#Text=Join Property Meld and help solve the headache that is rental maintenance...
#Text=We�re a small, profitable company, who have been working remotely since long before it became trendy.
#Text=Recognized as one of the fastest-growing startups in property management, we are looking for a motivated senior software engineer who wants to have an immediate impact.
#Text=Your Role\r
#Text=As a senior engineer, You will tackle tough engineering problems while developing and shipping new features for our product, making sure they are performant, scalable, and well-engineered.
#Text=As part of our remote-first engineering team, you will build on the foundation of a modern web application used by hundreds of thousands of people.

#Text=You�ll help scale Property Meld�s web application by developing new features, improving our CI/CD processes, profiling and fixing performance issues, and solving technical challenges alongside the rest of the team.
#Text=We�re looking for someone who:\r
#Text=� Can ship software with exceptional quality in a high-velocity team\r
#Text=� Can solve problems without adding accidental complexity\r
#Text=� Can take ownership of projects and architect them from the ground up to be scalable, maintainable, and elegant in design\r
#Text=� Is an expert in at least one area of building web applications and proficient in other areas\r
#Text=� Has a bias for action\r
#Text=� Has 8+ years of professional software development experience\r
#Text=� Has experience in some or all of the following: Python, Typescript, Django, React, and various data stores (relational databases, NoSQL databases)\r
#Text=\r
#Text=We recognize that good engineers can learn any technology so don�t hesitate to apply if your background is in other technologies.
#Text=Our focus is on delivering an amazing product at an impressive rate to our customers.
#Text=What you�ll get\r
#Text=� A remote work environment and a work laptop of your choice
#Text=.
#Text=� Great work-life balance\r
#Text=� The chance to build and scale out an ambitious project\r
#Text=� A team environment with a culture of execution\r
#Text=� Involvement in the decision-making process\r
#Text=� Great teammates that care about your success\r
#Text=� A chance to help solve the headache that is maintenance for millions of people\r
#Text=\r
#Text=Pay and benefits We provide a competitive benefits plan including health, dental, and vision coverage as well as a 401(k).
#Text=We provide an Employee Share Options Plan where every team member has a stake in the success we are building.
#Text=The product team at Property Meld is a remote-work organization.
#Text=We require 4 hours of overlap time, daily, with the Mountain Time zone.
#Text=The position is fully remote with the exception of a couple of yearly company get-togethers to meet in person
#Text=.
#Text=� Candidates must be eligible for full-time employment in the United States\r
